doc:
Angelique Pettyjohn https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Angelique_Pettyjohn 0 Angelique Pettyjohn (born Dorothy Lee Perrins, March 11, 1943 – February 14, 1992) was an American actress and burlesque queen. She appeared as the drill thrall Shahna in the Star Trek episode, "The Gamesters of Triskelion". Angelique_Pettyjohn ( born Dorothy_Lee_Perrins , March_11_,_1943 – February_14_,_1992 ) was an_American_actress and burlesque_queen . She appeared as the_drill_thrall_Shahna in the_Star_Trek_episode , " The_Gamesters of Triskelion_" .
